name: Tessian
description: View metrics and charts based on Tessian events API data.

children.name: Tessian - Architect
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Architect.
children.title: Tessian - Architect

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) as count _timeslice

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "architect_details.final_outcome" as final_outcome
| toLowerCase(final_outcome) as final_outcome
| replace(final_outcome, "_", " ") as final_outcome
| transactionize id (merge final_outcome takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by final_outcome
| sum(_count_distinct) final_outcome

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "architect_details.triggered_policy_names" as triggered_policies
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge triggered_policies takeLast)
| replace(triggered_policies,"[\"", "") as triggered_policies
| replace(triggered_policies,"\"]", "") as triggered_policies
| tolowercase(replace(triggered_policies,"_", " ")) as triggered_policies
| count by triggered_policies
| sum(_count) triggered_policies

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "outbound_email_details.from" as user
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge user, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "architect_details.triggered_policy_names" as triggered_policies
| sort by id, updated_at
| replace(triggered_policies,"[\"", "") as triggered_policies
| replace(triggered_policies,"\"]", "") as triggered_policies
| tolowercase(replace(triggered_policies,"_", " ")) as triggered_policies
| transactionize id (merge triggered_policies takeLast)
| count by triggered_policies
| sum(_count) triggered_policies
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

panels.title: Flagged Emails - Email Was Not Sent

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| json "architect_details.final_outcome" as final_outcome
| where final_outcome = "NOT_SENT"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

children.name: Tessian - Defender
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Defender.
children.title: Tessian - Defender

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "defender_details.confidence" as confidence
| toLowerCase(confidence) as confidence
| replace(confidence, "_", " ") as confidence
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge confidence takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count by confidence, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column confidence

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "inbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "defender_details.users_responded.deleted" as deleted
| json "defender_details.users_responded.malicious" as malicious
| json "defender_details.users_responded.safe" as safe
| json "defender_details.users_responded.unsure" as unsure
| sum(deleted) as deleted, sum(malicious) as malicious, sum(safe) as safe, sum(unsure) as unsure

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "defender_details.threat_types" as threat_types
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge threat_types takeLast)
| replace(threat_types,"[\"", "") as threat_types_replaced
| replace(threat_types_replaced,"\"]", "") as threat_types_replaced
| tolowercase(replace(threat_types_replaced,"_", " ")) as threat_types_replaced
| count by threat_types_replaced
| sum(_count) threat_types_replaced

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "inbound_email_details.recipients.to[0]" as user
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge user takeLast)
| count by user
| sum(_count) by user
| _sum as Flags
| sort by _sum desc
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "defender_details.impersonated_domain" as impersonated_domain
| where impersonated_domain != ""
| where impersonated_domain != null
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge impersonated_domain takeLast)
| count by impersonated_domain 
| sum(_count) by impersonated_domain
| _sum as Flags
| sort by _sum desc
| fields - _sum

panels.title: Total Warning Flags Seen by Users

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at", "inbound_email_details.message_id"
| where type = "defender"
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge type takeLast)
| count

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| json "defender_details.intent_types" as intent_types
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge intent_types takeLast)
| replace(intent_types, "[", "") as intent_types
| replace(intent_types, "]", "") as intent_types
| parse regex field=intent_types "\"(?<intent>.*?)\"" multi
| toLowerCase(intent) as intent
| replace(intent, "_", " ") as intent
| count intent

children.name: Tessian - Guardian
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Guardian.
children.title: Tessian - Guardian

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) as count _timeslice

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "guardian_details.breach_prevented" as breach_prevented
| where breach_prevented = "true"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge type, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "guardian_details.final_outcome" as final_outcome
| toLowerCase(final_outcome) as final_outcome
| replace(final_outcome, "_", " ") as final_outcome
| transactionize id (merge final_outcome takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by final_outcome
| sum(_count_distinct) final_outcome

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "guardian_details.type" as event_type
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge event_type takeLast)
| replace(event_type,"[\"", "") as event_type
| replace(event_type,"\"]", "") as event_type
| tolowercase(replace(event_type,"_", " ")) as event_type
| count by event_type
| sum(_count) event_type

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.from" as user
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge user takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "guardian_details.breach_prevented" as breach_prevented
| where breach_prevented = "true"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.from" as user
| transactionize id (merge user takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge type, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

children.name: Tessian - Overview
children.description: View top level stats and metrics related to all Tessian modules.
children.title: Tessian - Overview

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "defender"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "inbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at", "inbound_email_details.message_id"
| where type = "defender"
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge type takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count by type, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column type

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "guardian_details.breach_prevented" as breach_prevented
| where breach_prevented = "true"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id(merge type takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) by type, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column type

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) as count _timeslice

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at", "inbound_email_details.message_id"
|where type = "defender"
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge type takeLast)
| count

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "guardian"
| json "guardian_details.breach_prevented" as breach_prevented
| where breach_prevented = "true"
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| sort by id, updated_at
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "type", "id", "updated_at"
| where type = "architect"
| sort by id, updated_at
| json "outbound_email_details.message_id" as message_id
| transactionize id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)
